title: VONOTO Steamer pot for cooking,8.5 Quart,Food steamer,Dumpling steamer,Veggie steamer,Rice steamer,Bun steamer,Seafood steamer (SP-P05)
description: VONOTO Stainless steel Steamer pot High-Quality Materials: Our steamer is made of high-grade stainless steel, which makes it has uniform heat transfer. What's more, the middle of the lid is made of tempered glass, making the steamer more heat-resistant and allowing you to cook with confidence. Perfectly Size: Size. Pot Diameter: 11inch (28cm);Pot Total Height: 13inch (33cm);Pot Bottom High: 6.1inch (15.5cm);Steaming Grid High: 3.2inch (8.2cm);Pot lid Height: 3.5inch (9cm); Large steam diameter: 11inch (28cm);Small steamed Film Diameter: 10.8inch (27.5cm) Large Use Space & Arched Lid Design: The steaming cooking pot has a capacity of 8.5 Quart,and each layer steamer can hold up to 5 Quart,which can accommodate multiple Ingredients at one time;What's more,the tempered glass lid of the steaming cookware is arched so that makes the steamer pot can provides more cooking space perfectly. Compatible with Many Stoves: The bottom of the steamer is made of thickened composite, which can effectively make the bottom of the steamer evenly heated.The Bakelite handles stay cool while your cooking for safe usage with the hot pot. The pot can be used on all cooking surfaces. At the same time, this steamer can be compatible with a variety of stoves, including cooktop , electric stove tops , portable stoves , gas burners. Dishwasher Safe & Convenient Handle: The steamer consists of a large bottom pot,2 steamer pots, 2 septa and a lid, each part is easy to clean. What's more, you can put it in the dishwasher to free your hand. Unique design of handles on both sides allows yo use more comfortable and prevent burns.
